attributes.action: Help working parents to find childcare for the impossible hours companies expect
attributes.additional_details: Why can companies not stick to same rota jobs each week. Get the longterm unemployed off their backsides to do evening and night work.
attributes.background:
How do single working parents find sutible childcare to work the rubbish hours new jobs are expecting us to do. Creches and registered childminders do not work around the clock. Government won't pay family members which may I add 
could get some more people off benefits. Help me get this heard

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to help parents who are working.
